name: heyform
tagline: An open source form builder with logic rules and response analytics
description: HeyForm is an open source form builder and survey platform. It provides a modern drag and drop interface, logic rules and response analytics, suitable for contact forms, feedback and lead collection in self hosted environments.

features.title: Form Builder
features.description: Create forms using a visual web-based editor

features.title: Form Responses
features.description: Collect and manage submitted form data

features.title: Field Types
features.description: Use multiple input field types in forms

features.title: Response Export
features.description: Export collected responses for external use

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the form platform on your own infrastructure
